snippet: G.M. settled a wrongful-death lawsuit just last week with the parents of a crash victim. But the information uncovered in that case is being built on for a broader class action against the company.
abstract: General Motors has settled wrongful-death lawsuit with parents of crash victim Melton Brooke related to its defective ignition switches, but it still faces chance of depositions of its employees in broader class-action suit.
lead_paragraph: G.M. settled a wrongful-death lawsuit just last week with the parents of a crash victim. But the information uncovered in that case is being built on for a broader class action against the company.
